name: Good Apple Lightweight Full-Coverage Cream Foundation Balm
about: What it is:A buildable, full-coverage, hydrating foundation balm with a lightweight, long-wear formula and a fresh matte finish&mdash..Coverage:Full.Finish:Matte.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Apple Extract: Nourishes skin..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Infused with skin-nourishing apple extract, this non-comedogenic foundation balm minimizes the appearance of pores and gives skin a smooth, healthy look. The non-cakey, flashback-free formula quickly covers blemishes and discoloration for a speedy confidence boost..Clinical Results:In a consumer study on 32 volunteers:
ingredients: -Apple Extract: Nourishes skin. .-Sodium Hyaluronate: Hydrates skin...Triethylhexanoin, Octyldodecanol, Silica, Dimethicone, Dibutyl Lauroyl Glutamide, Octyldodecyl Neopentanoate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Isostearyl Alcohol, Oleyl Alcohol, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Mica, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Polysilicone-11, Aqua/Water/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Aluminum Hydroxide, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Hexylene Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Ascorbic Acid, Decyl Glucoside, Glycerin, Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, PCA, Saccharomyces/Magnesium Ferment, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Saccharomyces/Copper Ferment, Potassium Sorbate, Saccharomyces/Silicon Ferment, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Saccharomyces/Zinc Ferment, Hyaluronic Acid, Saccharomyces/Iron Ferment, Silanetriol, Citric Acid, Sorbic Acid, Histidine, Phenylalanine. May contain/Peut contenir (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Blend and build to your desired coverage using a beauty sponge or dense foundation brush. .-Use a patting motion to create the fullest coverage..-Use your finger to spot-conceal..-For oily areas, set foundation with Lock-It Setting Powder (sold separately)...Recycling Instructions:.-Recycle the box with paper goods..-Once empty, recycle the compact with plastics (where appropriate recycling facilities exist).

reviews.review_title: BEST Coverage Iu2019ve EVER had!!!! Bye imperfections!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly the BEST coverage for foundation!! It looks amazing! Feels amazing!! Not heavy!! Doesnu2019t dry out skin!! The coverage is absolutely amazing on age spots, brown spots, melasma etc.. Highly recommend!!! Trust me Iu2019ve tried so many!! You wonu2019t regret this, a beauty blender and some powder or bronzer whichever you desire and of course setting spray!!  etc!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light 006 - for fair skin with cool pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is no joke the best foundation iu2019ve bought itu2019s worth every penny iu2019ve tried lots of foundations + concealer combos and none of them ever do me this goood itu2019s worth every penny
